reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Samoa. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Samoa has no standing military and relies on assistance from its partners to provide for defense needs. Samoa's Maritime Police Unit serves a key border control and maritime policing function and provides coast guard and emergency response capabilities. Targeted U.S. assistance to the Maritime Police Unit aids Samoa by providing increased capacity for maritime policing, coastal defense, and emergency response.

All headquarters and overseas costs associated with the medical support of Volunteers. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.
